ly quick. At a few spots they

r into a convinient

urageous of the two MAXIMAL

ad arrived at a door. One

tand a small siege.

e lock and pulled

> 
> SHARPEDGE n=
odded as he pulled NIGHTLIGHT next to him to keep her out
> of sight should=
 gaurds come.
>

 feverishly.

nervously.

.

HT

TRON himself.
